title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 325-1.15 - License for emergency treatment not required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 325-1.15 - License for emergency treatment not required

State Regulations

No license is required for an employer to operate a first
aid station for emergency treatment, but no subsequent treatments are to be
rendered by anyone, other than a qualified physician on the minimum fee
schedule basis. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
325-1.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
